intros.
intros H.
apply list_app_eq_inv in H.
destruct H as [m1 [H1 H2]].
apply Forall2_app_inv_l in H1.
destruct H1 as [m1' [m2' [H1 [H2 H3]]]].
exists m1', m2'.
split.
+ assumption.
+ split.
  * assumption.
  * rewrite H2. reflexivity.

original: intros. intros H. apply list_app_eq_inv in H. destruct H as [m1 [H1 H2]]. apply Forall2_app_inv_l in H1. destruct H1 as [m1' [m2' [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists m1', m2'. split. + auto. + split. * auto. * rewrite H2. reflexivity.
